content.question: Based on the letter and its context, Metternich most clearly supported which of the following principles?

choices.label: The maintenance of traditional social structures and values
The application of scientific laws to society
The redistribution of resources and wealth

content.answer: The maintenance of traditional social structures and values

topic.text: 6.5: The Concert of Europe and European Conservatism

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
